name: Notion Book Tracker
description: A reading list notion template for tracking and organizing your books. Updated for 2024.Features:⋄ Reading Goal widget with a progress bar where you can set your goal for the current year and track your progress.⋄ Individual database for authors, genres, tags, and more to make managing your books easier.⋄ A separate database for a technical rating.⋄ A review template inside each added book with prompts to help you make your review.⋄ The template comes in three main colors as well as black &
